Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires corporations and municipalities to notify property owners prior to beginning certain services
Summary: Requires corporations and municipalities to notify property owners prior to beginning services that may interfere with a property owner's ability to enjoy, use, or access such property owner's property; exempts cases where a natural or man-made disaster or state of emergency occurs.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring corporations and municipalities to notify property owners prior to beginning certain services
